A

AbstractMuxConnection - Class in org.akubraproject.mux
An abstract base class for connections returned by multiplexing BlobStores.

Creates a new AbstractMuxConnection object.
AbstractMuxStore - Class in org.akubraproject.mux
An abstract base class for store implementations that multiplexes its backing stores to give a unified view.
AbstractMuxStore(URI, BlobStore...) - Constructor for class org.akubraproject.mux.AbstractMuxStore
Creates a new AbstractMuxStore object.

T

TransactionNeutralStoreWrapper - Class in org.akubraproject.mux
